Name: Cordial Inviter
Ingredients: 20 ml Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist (discard).
Review: Peach liqueur adds subtle orchard fruit notes to cognac with dry vermouth balancing and added complex wine and botanical complexity.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Connor O'Doherty at The Maven in Leeds, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Cordial Inviter contains 172 calories
